body:
ok so basically I want a new gaming mouse.

What I want:
•At or under $40
•more than 6 programable buttons
•I can change the color of the mouse(light)
•Iwant it to light up(If it can't change color than make it blue)
•Different Dpi settings

I found this but I want to see if I can find setting better or nicer:http://www.amazon.com/gp/aw/d/B00GU8W5AE/ref=mp_s_a_1_1?qid=1413422193&sr=8-1&pi=SY200_QL40

replies.body:
I really don't see the point of buying a really expensive mouse, when you can be saving your money up for things that actually matter. :/

Anyways, it's your choice, good luck and have fun! :)
